name: stock-market-prediction-web-app-using-machine-learning-and-sentiment-analysis-master
description: **Stock Market Prediction** Web App based on **Machine Learning** and **Sentiment Analysis** of Tweets **(API keys included in code)**. The front end of the Web App is based on **Flask** and **Wordpress**. The App forecasts stock prices of the next seven days for any given stock under **NASDAQ** or **NSE** as input by the user. Predictions are made using three algorithms: **ARIMA, LSTM, Linear Regression**. The Web App combines the predicted prices of the next seven days with the **sentiment analysis of tweets** to give recommendation whether the price is going to rise or fall
